Bash(cat /Users/krishparmar/GitHub/videoeditor_mcp/server/logs/session.jsonl | python3 -c "
import sys, json
entries = []
for line in sys.stdin:
    entries.append\(json.loads\(line.strip\(\)\)\)

# Show the flow of calls and results in order
for d in entries:
    ts = d['ts'].split\('T'\)[1][:8]
    tool = d.get\('tool','?'\)
    typ = d['type']
    if typ == 'tool_call':
        args = d.get\('args',{}\)
        q = args.get\('question',''\)[:60] if 'question' in args else ''
        desc = args.get\('description',''\)[:60] if 'description' in args else ''
        label = q or desc or ''
        print\(f'{ts} >>> CALL  {tool:30s}  {label}'\)
    elif typ == 'tool_result':
        ms = d.get\('durationMs',0\)
        err = d.get\('isError', False\)
        status = 'ERR' if err else 'OK'
        print\(f'{ts} <<< DONE  {tool:30s}  {ms:>6}ms  {status}'\)
    elif typ == 'tool_error':
        print\(f'{ts} !!! ERR   {tool:30s}  {d.get\(\\"error\\",\\"\\"\)[:60]}'\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cat /Users/krishparmar/GitHub/videoeditor_mcp/server/logs/session.jsonl | python3 -c "
import sys, json
entries = []
for line in sys.stdin:
    entries.append\(json.loads\(line.strip\(\)\)\)

# Only show recent entries \(after the prompt rewrite\)
for d in entries:
    ts = d['ts']
    if ts < '2026-02-21T20:45': continue
    t = ts.split\('T'\)[1][:8]
    tool = d.get\('tool','?'\)
    typ = d['type']
    if typ == 'tool_call':
        args = d.get\('args',{}\)
        desc = args.get\('description',''\)[:70]
        q = args.get\('question',''\)[:70]
        label = desc or q or ''
        print\(f'{t} >>> {tool:30s}  {label}'\)
    elif typ == 'tool_result':
        ms = d.get\('durationMs',0\)
        err = d.get\('isError', False\)
        out = \(d.get\('output'\) or ''\)[:80]
        status = 'ERR' if err else 'OK'
        print\(f'{t} <<< {tool:30s}  {ms:>6}ms  {status}  {out}'\)
    elif typ == 'tool_error':
        print\(f'{t} !!! {tool:30s}  {d.get\(\\"error\\",\\"\\"\)[:80]}'\)
" 2>&1)
